titles.title: To amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to authorize appropriations for the Civilian Community Corps Demonstration Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education and Civil Rights.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education and Training.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years after FY 1993 for the Civilian Community Corps Demonstration Program.
